review: The Evans UV1 Snare Drum Tune Up Kit is a comprehensive package that offers everything a drummer needs to maintain and enhance their snare drum. The UV-coated drumhead provides a durable and consistent sound, while the included accessories like the drum key and EQ Pods are very useful for keeping the drum in top condition. A great value for the price, though I wish the kit included a little more information on how to best use the maintenance items.
